mintByOwner(address,uint256).details: Creates `amount` new tokens for `to`, of token type `id`. See {ERC721-_mint}. Requirements: - the caller must be diamond owner.

devdoc.title: ERC721 - Mint as owner - With ERC2771 Context

userdoc.notice: Allow minting as owner via meta transactions, signed by the owner private key. (supports ERC721A)
